user_query: I want to cheer up my friend by providing her some inspirational horoscope readings and cancer rates information.

TaskList.description: Get the zodiac sign of the user’s friend to find the relevant horoscope readings.
Retrieve inspirational horoscope readings based on the identified zodiac sign.
Find the cancer rates in the state where the user’s friend resides.
Analyze the correlation between the inspiration from horoscope readings and the cancer rates found.
